chunks.content: Her marriage to rapper Jay Z and portrayal of Etta James in Cadillac Records (2008) influenced her third album, I Am... Sasha Fierce (2008), which saw the birth of her alter-ego Sasha Fierce.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly answers the question by stating that Beyonc√© created Sasha Fierce after portraying Etta James in Cadillac Records.
metadata.answer_contribution: It specifies the movie (Cadillac Records) and the timeline of creating Sasha Fierce.
